about_the_game:
Get a closer look at how the Round 2 Games artists created the breathtaking environments and uniquely Latin-American bosses of each legend fetured in Guardian of Lore.

In this Official Digital Artbook from Guardian of Lore, you'll get to see:


  • First versions and rough sketches that helped shape the artistically-painted look of each enviornment and character.
  • The evolution and change of style of our main hero Sayri, his trusty companion amulet, and the Mystical Library that houses all Lore.
  • Explorations from our terrifyingly challenging bosses, from the model sheets that helped their construction into 3D, to detailed screen-grabs of the models that appear in-game.
  • Curious, bite-sized facts about the real-life Latin-American inspirations that influenced the fantastical art you see in-game.

Sit back and enjoy this collection of original sketches and artworks, as well as detailed 3D-model captures, that capture the captivating process undertook by our artists to bring these uniquely exotic legends to the fantastical world of Guardian of Lore.



  • After downloading Guardian of Lore, search for it in your Steam Library and right-click on it.
  • On the small pop-up menu that appears, click on "Properties..."
  • Go to the "Local Files" tab and then click on the "Browse" button.
  • Your artbook should be in the game's folder. It is called GuardianOfLore_officialArtbook.pdf

Get a closer look at how the Round 2 Games artists created the breathtaking environments and uniquely Latin-American bosses of each legend fetured in Guardian of Lore.

In this Official Digital Artbook from Guardian of Lore, you'll get to see:


  • First versions and rough sketches that helped shape the artistically-painted look of each enviornment and character.
  • The evolution and change of style of our main hero Sayri, his trusty companion amulet, and the Mystical Library that houses all Lore.
  • Explorations from our terrifyingly challenging bosses, from the model sheets that helped their construction into 3D, to detailed screen-grabs of the models that appear in-game.
  • Curious, bite-sized facts about the real-life Latin-American inspirations that influenced the fantastical art you see in-game.

Sit back and enjoy this collection of original sketches and artworks, as well as detailed 3D-model captures, that capture the captivating process undertook by our artists to bring these uniquely exotic legends to the fantastical world of Guardian of Lore.



  • After downloading Guardian of Lore, search for it in your Steam Library and right-click on it.
  • On the small pop-up menu that appears, click on "Properties..."
  • Go to the "Local Files" tab and then click on the "Browse" button.

short_description: Which were the folkloric inspirations behind the beautiful landscapes and exotic bosses of Guardian of Lore? How did the heroic prince Sayri evolve over the course of development? Find this and more in this collection of original sketches, screenshots and concept art contained inside this Arbook!
